description:
My French Shabby Chic Furniture course covers all aspects from searching for the piece of furniture you want to refurbish, right through to presenting the item for sale & marketing it, followed by a detailed description including videos, links, documents, images & ongoing support, on how to build up a successful recurring client base French Shabby Chic Furniture business.

The materials included are videos, images & lessons, on every detail needed from start to finish. You will know all you need to know once you have finished the course to successfully start your own hobby or business.

It is entirely up to you how long it takes to complete this course - it could be tried & finished in a matter of a week or you may want to take longer; once again this is a personal choice.

The Layout of this course is extensively detailed, equipped with video tutorials, images & written information, including links to sites of 'descriptive know how', with everything you will need to successfully start producing refurbished French Shabby Chic Furniture for a Living.

This course is fun, full of detail, easy to understand & follow, & full of important knowledge, that you may not otherwise personally be aware of, to successfully produce refurbished French Shabby Chic Furniture.
title: How to French Shabby Chic Furniture for a Living
